Topic.Title: Mythion Adventures - New IF Game? Multiplayer?

Posts.EditableText:
Hi everyone. Has anyone heard of the IF mobile app called Mythion Adventures? Found them on twitter and I saw that they're multiplayer...I don't think I've ever seen a multiplayer IF app before. 

I played through an adventure in solo mode but interested in trying the multiplayer mode with someone. Let me know if you're on there or if you'd like to try with me. 

apple.co/2PWVFy3

Posts.EditableText: I have played, yes. I spend most of my free time diving into text based adventure games like Untold RPG, Titan Conquest, and 80 Days. This by far is the best because of its multiplayer functionality.
